name: Crate Hunter (Demo)
description:
Crate Hunter is an early concept idea for a game where you hunt monsters and collect them into crates to then sell to the highest bidder.

Become a rich patron of the arts with your income, or invest your earnings into more traps, gear and soldiers to come alone with you in your hunts!

CONTROLS:ARROW KEYS:WASD:Move UpUp ArrowWMove Down Down ArrowSMove Left Left ArrowAMove Right Right ArrowDInteract/Talk (A)ZJGo Back (B)XKMenuEnterEnter
